column1: #Text=The Camotes are a small island group in the Philippines .
#Text=Administratively , they are part of Cebu Province but they are some distance east of Cebu Island ( 63 km from Cebu City ) , actually closer to Leyte .
#Text=Until recently these islands did not get many tourists , though they have some fine beaches and dive sites .
#Text=Now there is considerable development with several resorts and quite a few resident foreigners .
#Text=The group includes three main islands and one small islet .
#Text=The islands of Pacijan and Poro are joined by a causeway ; Ponson is separate , a bit to the north .
#Text=There are several ports around the islands :
#Text=Poro is the main port , where the ferry from Cebu City arrives .
#Text=In addition , at some other places , such as Kawit , the pumpboat is just pulled up onto the beach .
#Text=Cebuano ( also called Bisayan ) is the main language of the islands .
#Text=Oceanjet . fast ferry two times a day to/from Cebu City .
#Text=Departure to Cebu : 6AM/3PM ( from Poro Port ) , ₱500 + ₱25 port tax .
#Text=Jomalia Shipping lines fast ferry Mactan to/from Consuelo port . depart Mactan at 8am-12 noon .
#Text=depart Consuelo port at 10am/4pm . travel time is 80 minutes . fare is ₱500
#Text=Jomalia Shipping lines roro ferry to/from Danao to Consuelo port ( five times a day ) . with a fare of ₱220
#Text=there is also a ferry going to/from Ormoc from Pilar port Camotes .
#Text=Rent a scooter for ₱300 a day or get a driver with a multicab .
#Text=Lake Danao ( small entrance and parking fee ; restaurants available )
#Text=View point and calvary near Timobo cave
#Text=Rent a scooter ( ₱300 /day + gas ) and explore the island .
#Text=Development Bank . near the market in Poro town has a 24-hour ATM .
#Text=If you are looking for midrange restaurants , choice will be limited to the resort restaurants .
#Text=Cheap eateries with lower prices and hygiene standards can be found around the island , especially at the beaches ( e. g. Santiago beach ) and in Poro ( market area ) .
#Text=big fan double rooms with shared bathroom .
#Text=Poro Town . Phone 099057552398 . fan double rooms with shared bathroom ₱300 a night .
#Text=Pamatasan ( 400m from San francisco town Public market ) .
#Text=dorm bed for 290 per person . fan double room with own bathroom from 388 . free wifi . a good clean low-cost place for backpackers to stay .
#Text=Seaside Guest house , 10 min walk from San francisco town . fan double room , outside bathroom , free wifi 400 .
